page.title: 12A Girl's School Outing Part2
page.content: We ran to Sarah Mobsby's house Miss Long phoned from there we got a lift from Mrs Manville,she took us back and then we went home.When I got home I got dressed into my playing clothes and went to call for Tina but she was not in. Beverley Eisnor Age 9 My mum looked out of the window when she heard voices.She almost fell over in surprise when she saw us come in at the gate.Mum opened the door and we all came pouring in,"how many of you are there," she said,me in the middle of it all said,"the whole class." Mum gave out towels .Me the lucky one could change. After about ten minutes they all got back to school apart from me because I did not go back to school.That was our outing in the rain. Sarah Mobsby age 9
